ygData.subject: Spying, aint a crime
ygData.msgSnippet: With the new horrifying bots pressence Wildrider presses another button on his chest which lowers a pair of bonucular type machine and he looks through it,

Subject: Spying, aint a crime
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

With the new horrifying bots pressence Wildrider presses another button on
his chest which lowers a pair of bonucular type machine and he looks
through it, "Who the hell is that?" he asks almost sounding intimidated as
he hands the machine to Drag Strip so he can take a look.
